attributes.action: Seek the dissolution of Parliament  and hold a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned and the people of great Britain, require Prime Minister Gordon Brown, to have an audience with the head of state, HM The Queen, to seek an immediate dissolution of Parliament and to hold a general election at the earliest possible time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
